name: Girlfriend
sentence:
Hey Boyfriend!
I’m really glad you made it!

I’m sorry for sending you the wrong
address earlier.

name: Boyfriend
sentence:
Oh don’t worry, when I looked at it, I was
sure it wasn’t the theatre that you mentioned.
...Man, there sure are a lot of people here.

name: Girlfriend
sentence:
You can definitely say that! When I put up
the fliers around town, I really wasn’t expecting
people to show up.
I worded that wrong.

I meant to say that I wasn’t expecting MANY
people to show up to the extent that it would
fill up an entire theatre.

name: Boyfriend
sentence:
Well I guess your promotional skills and the
art that your friend made really did catch
people’s attention.

Girlfriend,
this is really a dream come true for me!

I can finally become a rising star,
just like your parents!

name: Girlfriend
sentence:
I hope so!
If you can win me over with that voice of yours,

I’m sure you’ll beat my dad.
Whilst for the promotional thing...
I don’t really know.

A lot of people are here for my dad...
and not really for you.

name: Boyfriend
sentence:
Ha, I’ll just beat your dad and prove to
those fans that he shouldn’t get
back into music.

Speaking of which,
why did he leave the music career anyway?

name: Girlfriend
sentence:
Uhh, pretty sure he stopped after
being put in prison for five years,

after trying to steal from a
record store.

name: Boyfriend
sentence: That sounds...
very stupid.

name: Girlfriend
sentence:
I know, apparently he tried
destroying someone’s reputation,
so he stole the records.

name: Boyfriend
sentence:
But that literally has no effect on
the person he was trying to take out.

name: Girlfriend
sentence: That’s what I’m saying!
Google, show me this guy's balls
